channel.title: iPodLinux
channel.description:
Ilya wanted me to post this. Basically, it's Linux for iPods. *hint hint*
Before I post the link, here's an important message from him:
[quote="io9"]Make sure you post this exact thing THIS DOES NOT WORK ON 2nd GENERATION IPOD NANOS!!!11 A SECOND GENERATION NANO IS THE ONE WITH THE ROUNDED EDGES AND A COLORED BACK INSTEAD OF A SILVER ONE!!1111 THIS DOES NOT WORK ON 2nd GENERATION IPOD NANOS!!!11 A SECOND GENERATION NANO IS THE ONE WITH THE ROUNDED EDGES AND A COLORED BACK INSTEAD OF A SILVER ONE!!1111 THIS DOES NOT WORK ON 2nd item.title: iPodLinux
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“Mercury92, post:10, topic:86559”].rockbox is easier to use and install. And in .rockbox there are cool Plugins and etc. You can watch Videos on nano
and site is here http://www.rockbox.org/[/quote]
Meh, I use a custom Loader2 that boots iPL, osos, or rbX depending on the time

Read full topic
